name: Toy Story Quiz: Toy Story 2 | 15 Questions

questions.text: At the beginning of the movie, where is Woody planning to go with Andy for a few days?
Why doesn't Woody end up going with Andy when he leaves?
questions.correct: His arm starts to come off
options: Andy thinks the other kids will make fun of him for playing with dolls
questions.explanation:
His arm starts to come off.

	His arm is ripping off near the shoulder, so he's shelved until Andy returns.

questions.text: Who is the toy that Woody goes to rescue from the yard sale?
questions.explanation:
Wheezy.

	Wheezy's squeaker broke months ago. Andy's mom hid him on the top shelf after she said she'd get him fixed. Then she found him when she was looking for yard sale items and took him down.

questions.text: Who ends up taking Woody from the yard sale?
options: the little girl who found him
questions.explanation:
Al.

	A little girl found him, but her mother took him and put him on a table. Woody's voice plays, and the unscrupulous Al hears him. He tries to buy him, but Andy's mom won't deal. After Al creates a diversion, he steals Woody away.

questions.text: What type of costume does Al wear for his Al's Toy Barn commercials?
questions.explanation:
chicken.

	After Buzz decodes Al's vanity license plate, he has Etch draw Al in a chicken outfit. Then all the toys recognize him from his commercials.

questions.text: Which toy is NOT a member of the team that goes to rescue Woody?
What was the collective name for all of the characters from the old TV show that starred Woody?
questions.explanation:
The Round-up Gang.

	The name of the TV show was 'Woody's Round-up'.

questions.text: Who was not a part of the cast of the old TV show that starred Woody?
questions.explanation:
Mad Dog Tannen.

	Mad Dog Tannen was the evil gunfighter in 'Back To The Future III'.

questions.text: What other Disney characters made a brief appearance in this movie?
questions.explanation:
Heimlich and Flik.

	They were on a blade of grass outside of Al's apartment building. Buzz then came through, karate-chopping grass out of his way. In the 'outtakes' at the end of the movie, there's a conversation between Heimlich and Flick about 'Bug's Life 2', just before Buzz hits them. (The voice of Ariel, Jodi Benson, provided the voice for Barbie.)

questions.text: What was the name of the girl who used to own Jessie?
questions.explanation:
Emily.

	Emily outgrew playing with Jessie, knocking her under the bed one day when her and her friends were playing with make-up. Emily finds Jessie years later, and Jessie is happy again. Her joy is squashed when Emily leaves her in a box next to a donation truck, which is parked near the meadow where they used to play. (This whole story is replayed with the emotional background song 'When She Loved Me', sung by Sarah MacLachlan.)

questions.text: What is the maximum power setting on Zurg's ion blaster?
questions.explanation:
11.

	This is in reference to Nigel Tufnel's (Christopher Guest) amplifier in 'This is Spinal Tap'. (Ludicrous is the maximum speed of the Spaceball's ship in 'Spaceballs'.)

questions.text: What happened to Stinky Pete after he's defeated at the airport?
questions.correct: He gets put into a little girl's backpack
options: The other toys put him back in the carrying case to Japan
He gets squashed by the airport luggage conveyers
He gets thrown into the airport 'lost and found'
questions.explanation:
He gets put into a little girl's backpack.

	He's going to get a make-over from his new owner. 'She's an artist!'

questions.text: What is unique about Tom Hanks's (Woody) and Tim Allen's (Buzz) participation in this movie?
questions.correct: First time for both actors being in a sequel
options: First time they'd met; their parts in 'Toy Story' were recorded separately
First time they'd worked with their wives in a movie
questions.explanation:
First time for both actors being in a sequel.

	They certainly got paid: Each got a salary of {$5,000,000;} their 'Toy Story' salary was only {$50,000.} Hanks has also been in 4 movies with his {wife;} Allen's wife is not an actress. And no, 'Apollo 13' is not the twelfth sequel to 'Apollo'.  By the way, since 'Toy Story 2' was released, Tim Allen has been in another sequel: 'The Santa Clause 2'.

questions.text: When the rescue team first breaks into Al's apartment, Mr. Potato Head goes to put on his angry eyes to fight. He instead put what into his eyeholes?
At the end of the movie, a repaired Wheezy sings 'You've Got a Friend In Me', Las Vegas style. What singer provides his singing voice?
